text:
#Hyderabad:

@samajwadiparty President & MP @yadavakhilesh met @BRSparty
working president @KTRBRS and former minister @BRSHarish Rao at their Nandi Nagar residence today.

“#KTR and @KCRBRSPresident are our friends, we will always stand with them,” Akhilesh Yadav said. https://t.co/vaZthIvSeC

text:
#Hyderabad:

@CPHydCity @SajjanarVC warns against forced collections by #transgender groups

At an interaction with 250 transgender persons today, the CP urged the community to avoid illegal activities and use govt #welfareschemes to live with dignity.

ADGP Charu Sinha explained the role of ‘Pride Place’, a special wing to address their grievances.

Officials noted that #Telangana has nearly 50,000 trans persons, and urged them to obtain govt ID cards to access #schemes & #reservations.

Efforts are underway to create more #corporatejob opportunities for the community.

@hydcitypolice

text:
#Hyderabad:

#Watersupply alert – Hyderabad

A major leakage occurred on the 1500 mm PSC pumping main of the #Manjeera Phase-2 pipeline near #Rudraram, disrupting drinking water supply to several parts of the city today.

@HMWSSBOnline teams are carrying out emergency repair works and expect to restore supply by Saturday afternoon.

Affected Areas:

#Beeramguda
#Ameenpur 
#Miyapur
#DeeptiSrinagar
#KPHBHousingBoard
#Nizampet
#Hydernagar
#Moosapet
#Erragadda

Residents in these zones are advised to plan water usage accordingly. 

Repair works are in full swing.
